::Prowl::

He was glad to see his shot hit, and not find a fusion blast coming at
him. He watched as Megatron was pushed away by the water pressure. He
wasn't one to leave a job undone, Prowl ran at Megatron, firing anoth
missile at him, as well as two ninja stars.
